name: Stickman Fire War
description:
Stickman Fire War!!!You are in charge of leading a small group of stickman soldiers. Each of them have different characteristics and weapons. Attack, defense, special tricks... You have a vast variety of strategies to defeat the enemy.
CHARACTERISTICS
• Epic battles with a lot a surprises
• Build your defense into an unbeatable fortress
• Collect energy to build units
• Hours of gameplay with over 50 levels
